original_title: The 19th Annual A Home For The Holidays
overview: A Home For The Holidays features uplifting stories of adoption from foster care and raises awareness of this important social issue. The inspirational stories of these American families are enhanced with performances by some of todayâ€™s most popular artists, including headliner Josh Groban, plus Kelly Clarkson, Kacey Musgraves, and Kane Brown.
title: The 19th Annual A Home For The Holidays
